title: (x) "Solemates" boat name inscription - hand painted (similar to Bell) {Mike Y}
content: I am thinking it looks a lot like Monotype's "Bell". That's what I used to make the attachment. ![Soulmate Sim](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826020012im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22919.gif)
author: bowfinpw

comments.content: Now that I see them closer together, I am not so sure. The serifs on the E and L don't look right. I used the Semibold weight of Bell. Maybe lighter weight would look closer?

Seems a lettering job to me. The forms of the serifs at the end of the E bars, and others are not typical of a true Serif text face, they are too small and too direct a mechanical copy of the regular serif.   
   
The overall seems visual a mixture of Times, Caslon and others! But yes, Bell or Miller can be a good replacement.   
   
 [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/font\_frames.tpl?fontname=Miller](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826020012/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/font_frames.tpl?fontname=Miller)
